SEARCH
Package util

Class StageManager

java.lang.Object
util.StageManager
public class StageManager extends Object
Manages the creation of JavaFX stages dynamically. This class assists in creating stages for various scenes in the application.
Author:
xxxx, yyyy

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage(String sceneName) throws IOException
      Creates stage based off of input String sceneName for specific User user
      Parameters:
      sceneName - name of fxml and respective controller
      Returns:
      new Stage
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage(String sceneName, User user) throws IOException
      Creates a stage based on the specified scene name for the given user.
      Parameters:
      sceneName - The name of the FXML file and its respective controller.
      user - The current user signed in.
      Returns:
      A new Stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage(String sceneName, User user, ArrayList<Photo> result) throws IOException
      Creates a stage based on the specified scene name for the given user and list of photos.
      Parameters:
      sceneName - The name of the FXML file and its respective controller.
      user - The current user signed in.
      result - ArrayList of photos to be passed to the controller.
      Returns:
      A new Stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getAddPhotoStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getAddPhotoStage(User currUser, Album album) throws IOException
      Creates stage based off of input String sceneName for specific User user when Adding a photo to album
      Parameters:
      album - Album being passed to Add_PhotoController
      sceneName - name of fxml and respective controller
      Returns:
      new AddPhotoStage
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadScene

      public void loadScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String sceneName) throws IOException
      Loads a scene onto a stage with the specified scene name.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to load the scene onto.
      sceneName - The name of the FXML file and its respective controller.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • loadScene

      public void loadScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, String sceneName, User user) throws IOException
      Loads a scene onto a stage with the specified scene name and user.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to load the scene onto.
      sceneName - The name of the FXML file and its respective controller.
      user - The current user signed in.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getConfirmation

      public boolean getConfirmation() throws IOException
      Displays a confirmation dialog box and returns the user's choice.
      Returns:
      True if the user confirms, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getEditCaptionStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getEditCaptionStage(User currUser, Photo selectedPhoto) throws IOException
      Creates a stage for editing the caption of a selected photo.
      Parameters:
      currUser - The current user signed in.
      selectedPhoto - The photo whose caption will be edited.
      Returns:
      A new Stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

    • getMovePhotoStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getMovePhotoStage(User currUser, Album album, Photo selectedPhoto) throws IOException
      Creates stage based off of input String sceneName for specific User user when copying photo
      Parameters:
      album - original photo is located
      selectedPhoto - Photo to be moved
      sceneName - name of fxml and respective controller
      Returns:
      new MovePhotoStage
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getAddTagStage

      Creates a stage for adding a tag to a selected photo.

      currUser - The current user signed in.
      selectedPhoto - The photo to which the tag will be added.

      A new Stage.

    • loadPhotosScene

      public void loadPhotosScene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, User currUser, Album selectedAlbum) throws IOException
      Loads the photos scene onto a stage for the specified user and selected album.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage to load the scene onto.
      currUser - The current user signed in.
      selectedAlbum - The album selected by the user.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
